Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dice

  • public class Dice
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a system of the dice that will be used in the game. It stores the randomly generated values into two static attributes die1 and die2
    Author:
    Elias Haroun

      static void throwDice()
      Generates random numbers between 1 and 6 and stores them in die1 and die2
